rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall designed with Vastu principles in mind, ensuring auspicious entry. Features decorative elements and a clear pathway to the living area.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living room adjoining the kitchen, incorporating ample natural light through south-facing windows for positive energy flow as per Vastu. Includes seating arrangements and built-in storage.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Dining area integrated with the living room, featuring a central dining table and light fixtures that enhance the ambiance according to local design norms.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space designed for ease of movement and efficient work triangle. Includes modern fittings while respecting traditional Indian aesthetics.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom with essential fixtures, tiled flooring, and good ventilation in accordance with local building norms.

rooms.name: bedroom_1
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ensuite bathroom and ample closet space. Positioned to ensure privacy and a quiet environment following Vastu guidelines for the head of the family.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for children, ensuring safety, comfort, and an auspicious layout per Vastu principles.
